pr_title: CB-10324: Add entitlement for EFS in CloudBreak

timeline.message: CB-10324: Add entitlement for EFS in CloudBreak
CB-10324: Add entitlement for EFS in CloudBreak

timeline.bodyText: this means that locally we will always use EFS. This is what you want to achieve here ?
timeline.author: doktoric
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -29,6 +29,7 @@ auth:
     mediumdutysdx.enable: true
     upgrade.internalrepo.enable: true
     hbase.cloudstorage.enable: true
+    datalake.efs.enable: true

replies.bodyText: I can turn it off, and only enable in my local dev.
replies.author: LinaAtAustin
